choices.B: Test with diverse and representative datasets appropriate for how the model will be used.
choices.C: Test only with data from a specific region or demographic to limit the risk of data leaks.
choices.A: Rely on a development team with uniform backgrounds to assess the potential societal implications of the model.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Test with diverse and representative datasets appropriate for how the model will be used.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks is testing a new AI model.

Which approach aligns with Salesforce's Trusted AI Principle of Inclusivity?

choices.C: Lead scoring, opportunity forecasting, and case classification
choices.A: Sales data cleansing and customer support data governance
choices.B: Machine learning models and chatbot predictions

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Lead scoring, opportunity forecasting, and case classification

Selected Answer: C
C. Lead scoring, opportunity forecasting, and case classification

choices.C: The accuracy of product recommendations is hindered.
choices.A: The diversity of product recommendations is improved.
choices.B: The response time for product recommendations is stalled.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
